column1: The Purple Pig////I started out with a Paloma which was expertly made. We decided to go with the charcuterie board with sopressa and duck procuttio . Both are made in house. I thought the sopressa was excellent and the duck was ok. I think I'll go with another meat next time. The cheese was outstanding
column2: but expected. The surprising Star was the bread....mmmmmmm. This board was the real deal. This seems like the thing to get with wine!
